TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {35809=The Monarchy was reestablished in January 2014 and Critically was chosen by the eBelgian community as King and confirmed by congress First update, 103475=Through it's history and mainly through the wars with France and United Kingdom, Belgium has signed Mutual Protection Pacts (MPPs) with countries, members of ONE, mainly to defend its regions. The Belgian Congress approved recently the Charter of CoT and Belgium became a full member of Circle of Trust alliance in 10/13/2012 [1]. Beginning of November 2013 Belgium left the alliance CoT just like most of it's members did and has since then taken a renewed neutral stance again. Since early 2014 the government decided to take a pro-Sirius stance., 34783=Belgium was among the first countries in the beginning of eRepublik. Belgium's population grew slowly before they agreed to merge with the United Kingdom in April 2008. In February 2009, 10 months after Belgium merged with the United Kingdom, two resistance wars were launched to free Belgium, the first failed but the next succeeded. It wasn't until the 21st February 2009 before Belgium became a complete independent nation., 35355=Mittekemuis was named Queen of eBelgium on July 4, 2011 by a congress majority[1] and shortly thereafter announced the royals and other nobles of eBelgium in an article Mittekemuis Annoucement, 88301=The political parties of Belgium are listed below. They are the current parties of the Belgian Freedom Period, and may be subject to immediate change. Current settings of the list below are based on day 2651, 29224=Belgium (French: Belgique, Dutch: België, German: Belgien) is a small country in Western Europe. Belgium is currently in its third era of existence, having been part of two different unions, one with the UK and one with the Netherlands, called the United Netherlands. Belgium is a parliamentary democracy. It had maintained a neutral stance in the politics and wars surrounding it, until 13 October 2013 when it has declared its support for the Circle of Trust (CoT)and was a full member. Beginning of November 2013 Belgium left the alliance CoT just like most of it's members did and has since then taken a renewed a neutral stance for a while, but has gone pro-Sirius since.}

textAfterTable: Congress Due to the occupation of Belgium there is no congress at this time. In the first half of March 2014 Belgium regained all it's regions before the congress election started and thereby in the first time since 5 months ago there was a full congress again. To view the most recent congress election results it is recommended to look at the eRepublik Election Result Page. 26% 21% 20% 19% 14% Key: The Belgian Dream The Force
